attributes.action: we refuse to pay for the 1% crisis - we are the 99% -support the global 'occupy' movement
attributes.additional_details:
1. the current system is unstainable. It is undemocratic and unjust. We need aternatives from the people, not coporations
2. We stand together against unjust governments.
3. We refuse to pay for the bank crisis.
4. We do not accept the cuts as either necessary or inevitable. We demand an end to global tax injustice and our democracy representing coporations instead of people.
5. we want regulation to be genuinely independent of the industries they regulate.
6.We support the strike on the 30th Nov and 9th Nov 2011 and actions to defend our health, welfare, education and employment and to stop wars and arms dealing.
7.We want structural change towards authentic global equality. The worlds resources must go towards caring for people and the planet, not the military, corporate profits or the rich.
8. we stand for solidarity with the globally oppressed and call for an end to the action of our government and others in causing oppression.
9. We want true democracy.
